Application_Code.title: Application_Code
Application_Code.description: Format: 5 digit number, found on the Application record Application_Code__c field This is the unique identifier of the Application record

CTC.title: CTC
CTC.description: Format: Text field but the Candidate will give a Currency format. This is their total cost to company. user's input should be populated on the Cost_To_Company__c field on the Candidate__c record

CTCBreakdown.title: CTCBreakdown
CTCBreakdown.description: Format: Text This is a breakdown of what is included in their Cost To Company Example, Basic Salary: R50000, Medical: Aid R1000, Pension: R5000 And if they are getting a Bonus or not. user's input should be populated on the Cost_To_Company_Breakdown__c field on the Candidate__c record

CareerGoals.title: CareerGoals
CareerGoals.description: Format: Text These are the Candidate's Career goals and to be populated on the Career_Goals__c field on the Candidate__c record

Criminal.title: Criminal
Criminal.description:
The user's answer to the "Do you have a criminal record" question if yes then they need to give an explanation. 
This is to be used in the Criminal Output
To populate the Criminal_record__c field on the Applicant record
Format: Text

Email.title: Email
Email.description: Format: Email This is the Email Address the Candidate typed when they started their chat. This is the unique identifier if the Candidate record

FamInPWC.title: FamInPWC
FamInPWC.description:
The User needs to specify whether they have family in the company for the question: do you have Family or friends in PwC
Field to update on Application: Family_in_PWC__c
Format: Text

FirstPrefOffice.title: FirstPrefOffice
FirstPrefOffice.description:
The User will indicate which office they prefer When they are asked to do so
Format: Text
Field to update on Application: Preferred_Office__c

NonNegotiables.title: NonNegotiables
NonNegotiables.description: The Non Negotiables on the Job_Spec record from the Non_Negotiables field.

QuestionsAndAnswers.title: QuestionsAndAnswers
QuestionsAndAnswers.description: These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Questions to ask field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically

ReasonForLeaving.title: ReasonForLeaving
ReasonForLeaving.description: This is the Reason for leaving provided by the candidate and to be populated in the Reason_For_Leaving__c field on the Candidate record

SAICA.title: SAICA
SAICA.description:
The User needs to indicate if they have ever been a member of the CAICA 
Format: Text
To populate the Been_in_a_SAICA_Contract__c field on the Candidate record

SecondPrefOffice.title: SecondPrefOffice
SecondPrefOffice.description:
The User will indicate which office they prefer second
Format: Text
To populate the Second_preferred_office__c on the Applicant record
